'''Aidan Crowe''' is an actor based in Ireland. He has appeared in several short films: ''11 Missed Calls'', ''Starstruck'', ''Buddy'', ''Vanner'', and ''My Passenger''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he is playing [[Quent]]. He joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 2|second season]].
